Service Details: - Produces a 4-hour wandering harvest festival where participants wander with a wine glass and linen napkin in hand, and taste the best of BC from chefs, farmers, fishers, ranchers, food artisans, vintners, brewers, distillers and other beverage producers from across the province- Highlights connections between farmers and chefs, fields and tables, farm folks and city folks- Each annual fundraising event is a journey towards a sustainable, local food system
